title: Biden’s leaked Afghanistan peace plan, explained: A “Hail Mary” bid to bring Ghani and Taliban to an agreement
content:
1. Biden’s leaked Afghanistan peace plan, explained: A “Hail Mary” bid to bring Ghani and Taliban to an agreement  Vox.com
  2. U.S. proposes interim power-sharing government with Taliban in Afghanistan  The Washington Post
  3. Blinken offers plan to bolster Afghan peace process, report indicates  POLITICO
  4. U.S. Warns Kabul It May Withdraw All Forces By May 1 If Peace Talks Do Not Progress  NPR
  5. As US mulls Afghan exit, activist sees long fight for women  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 拜登泄露的阿富汗和平计划，解释。"万福玛利亚 "计划让加尼和塔利班达成协议。
拜登泄露的阿富汗和平計劃，解釋。"萬福瑪利亞 "計劃讓加尼和塔利班達成協議。
